author: Harry Craddock
description: Medium-dry and wonderfully aromatic with faint notes of almond from the fino sherry and delicately fruity maraschino. Delicious.
name: Coronation Cocktail No.1
recipeIngredient: 1.25 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix) (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
